feature.label: ProR for Rodin
feature.description: This Feature contains Adapters and Presentations for ProR for the Rodin Platform. REVISION HISTORY 6.0.0 ----- New release to support core-8.0.0 5.0.2 ----- Bug Fixes 5.0.1 ----- Added dependency to core as a feature 5.0.0 ----- New release to support core-7.0.0 4.1.0 ----- New release to support core-6.0.0 4.0.0 ----- Rodin Integration now works with Drag&Drop 3.4.0 ----- Bug fixes in Rodin integration code. 3.1.0 ----- Some Plugins were merged. No user visible changes. 3.0.0 ----- Adaption to the new Specification View
